duties_responsibilities.duty: Write scripts, participate in daily editorial meetings and present story ideas
Play a key role in the impact of the newscast and be an innovative, enthusiastic team player
Implement strategic plans to create clean, accurate, and compelling newscasts
Work closely with team members to ensure that newscasts will successfully air with all technical elements in place and station initiatives handled properly
Adapt quickly and calmly to find solutions as problems arise

education_certification.credential: A college degree and at least one year of experience are preferred
